main.java.pds

Class DeliveryManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.pds.DeliveryManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Updateable

    public class DeliveryManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements Updateable, java.io.Serializable
    DeliveryManager is the class representing the delivery waiting area and collection of delivery people
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addDeliveryPerson(Delivery person)
      Add a delivery person.
      java.util.ArrayList<Delivery> getDeliveryQueue()
      Get the queue of delivery people
      WaitingQueue getDeliveryWaitingQueue()
      Get the queue of items waiting for delivery
      void update()
      Creates a temporary list of current orders in the deliver_waiting area, checks for non-busy delivery people, hands them an order if it can, and removes the orders' items from the waiting area

      • update

        public void update()
        Creates a temporary list of current orders in the deliver_waiting area, checks for non-busy delivery people, hands them an order if it can, and removes the orders' items from the waiting area
